### Steps to reproduce the issue

Ping @raffenet @yfguo, can you reproduce? Should we add a conflict for clang?

```console
$ spack install mpich~fortran target=x86_64 %clang@6.0.0
```

### Error Message

title: mpich 3.4 doesn't build with clang 6.0.0
